description.headline: Contact me
description.encourageOne: Please feel free to contact me – I would be delighted to learn more about your projects. I am particularly interested in positions in front-end/Angular development where I can contribute to turning ideas into clean, scalable and user-friendly applications.
description.encourageTwo: I add value by delivering reliable, maintainable code, developing responsive UI components and focusing on performance, usability and clean architecture – so that your projects are easy to extend and enjoyable to use.
